tool.name: jackknifed beta diversity
tool.description: A workflow script for performing jackknifed UPGMA clustering and build jackknifed 2d and 3D PCoA plots.
tool.command:
jackknifed_beta_diversity.py -i $otu_table_fp -o jackknifed_beta_diversity_output -e $seqs_per_sample -m $mapping_fp #if str($tree_fp) != 'None': -t $tree_fp #end if
#if str($parameter_fp) != 'None': -p $parameter_fp #end if
#if str($master_tree) != 'None': --master_tree=$master_tree #end if
#if $parallel: -a #end if
#if $jobs_to_start: -O $jobs_to_start #end if ; compress_path.py -i jackknifed_beta_diversity_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -e/--seqs_per_sample: number of sequences to include in each jackknifed subset [REQUIRED]
param.name: seqs_per_sample

param.label: -t/--tree_fp: path to the tree file [default: None; REQUIRED for phylogenetic measures]
param.name: tree_fp

param.label: -p/--parameter_fp: path to the parameter file, which specifies changes to the default behavior. See http://www.qiime.org/documentation/file_formats.html#qiime-parameters . [if omitted, default values will be used]
param.name: parameter_fp

param.label: --master_tree: method for computing master trees in jackknife analysis. "consensus": consensus of trees from jackknifed otu tables. "full": tree generated from input (unsubsambled) otu table. [default: consensus]
param.name: master_tree

param.label: -a/--parallel: Run in parallel where available [default: False]
param.name: parallel

param.label: -O/--jobs_to_start: Number of jobs to start. NOTE: you must also pass -a to run in parallel, this defines the number of jobs to be started if and only if -a is passed [default: 1]
param.name: jobs_to_start

tool.help: To directly measure the robustness of individual UPGMA clusters and clusters in PCoA plots, one can perform jackknifing (repeatedly resampling a subset of the available data from each sample). This scripts results in several distance matrices (from beta_diversity.py), several rarified otu tables (from multiple_rarefactions.py) several UPGMA trees (from upgma_cluster.py), a supporting file and newick tree with support values (from tree_compare.py), and 2D and 3D PCoA plots.
